name: Magic Michi: In The Mystic Skies
name_original: Magic Michi: In The Mystic Skies
description:
Magic Michi: In the Mystic Skies is a 1st person puzzle game with magic mechanics and low poly art style. The main plot is about a wizard cat whose kittens have been scattered across different islands and through solving different puzzles all kittens must be saved.

The main character can cast two different spells, a breaking spell to crush obstacles and a magnet spell that allows you to move objects through distance. 

Controls:
Mouse → Rotate Camera

W/A/S/D → Basic Movement

Spacebar → Jump

Shift → Sprint

F → Interact

Q/E/Mouse Wheel → Change Spell

Left/Right Mouse Click →  Cast Spell

Mouse → Navigate the menus

Z → Attract levitating objects

X → Repel levitating objects

Tab/Esc → Open/Close Pause Menu

Your progress is saved whenever you complete a level.

You can only have a single save file, so starting a new game will rewrite your file.

For those who got stuck  Walkthrough.
